headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.3-b55b4dc0296df3a6a3c767962fb96a2e8c49527f "the [?local=true] query parameter to get-aliases requests has no effect and will be removed in a future version", 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.3-b55b4dc0296df3a6a3c767962fb96a2e8c49527f "this request accesses system indices: [.security-7, .tasks], but in a future major version, direct access to system indices will be prevented by default"
